summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 5.0 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 223 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1806 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air moisture should feel ok and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
